history.proof: intros x m M H. unfold Rabs, Rmax. destruct H. destruct (Rle_dec M (- m)). - qsimpl time: 2 use: RRle_abs. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + hauto use: Rle_lt_trans unfold: Rmin, Rle. - apply Rabs_le_between; split. + hauto lq: on drew: off use: Rnot_le_lt, Ropp_lt_cancel, Rlt_le_trans, Ropp_involutive unfold: Rle. + qsimpl time: 2 use: RRle_abs,Rmin_l,Rmin_r.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, m, M : R H : m <= x H0 : x <= M r : M <= - m Unable to unify "?M2294 < Rabs ?M2294 \\/ ?M2294 = Rabs ?M2294" with "(if Rcase_abs x then - x else x) < - m \\/ (if Rcase_abs x then - x else x) = - m".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment x, m, M : R H : m <= x H0 : x <= M n : ~ M <= - m Unable to unify "Rmin ?M2785 ?M2786 < ?M2785 \\/ Rmin ?M2785 ?M2786 = ?M2785" with "- M < x \\/ - M = x".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
In environment x, m, M : R H : m <= x H0 : x <= M n : ~ M <= - m Unable to unify "Rmin ?M2971 ?M2972 < ?M2972 \\/ Rmin ?M2971 ?M2972 = ?M2972" with "x < M \\/ x = M".

original: intros x m M H. unfold Rabs, Rmax. destruct H. destruct (Rle_dec M (- m)). - apply RRle_abs. - apply Rabs_le_between; split. + unfold Rmin. apply Rmin_l. + apply Rmin_r.
